name: Music Run
description:
A very rough version of this game. Although, I'd only really like to basically replace all the art into something that looks nice and makes sense. If you feel like you're up for helping me, email me at zachvdgATgmailDOTcom. 

Directions: Get the coins. Avoid the monsters. Pick the path that matches the instrument family. Go for your high score! (Mine is 76.)

Controls: Click the arrows or use the Up and Down Arrow Keys to move.
